ack.title: Acknowledgement
ack.p: The authors would like to acknowledge the contributions of Peiman Lahsaei, MD; Trushil Shah, MD; and Edward Mims, MD, for comments that greatly improved the article. The authors further acknowledge the assistance of Jamie Stiner, CHSOS, from the UT Southwestern High Reliability Team and their COVID-19 ICU nurse, respiratory therapist, and pharmacist colleagues for helping develop, test, and implement their CPR protocol.

sec.title: Conflict of Interest
sec.p: No potential conflict of interest was reported by the authors.
